overview:
Kay Ballard is General Counsel and Co-founder of New Media International, Inc., a new media information and software publishing company that includes within its scope all new media platforms including email, blogging, audio, video, and social media and produces conferences and other live events related to new media.

Kay holds a juris doctor degree from The Ohio State University College of Law and is knowledgeable in online and intellectual property legal issues. A former foundation executive and seasoned businesswoman, she is a prolific practitioner of the digital live public conversation.
